prompt.heading: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Add fade-in effect, apply a slide transition, smoothen image entry...

items.title: Fade-In Effect
items.description: Create engaging presentations with smooth fade-in transitions.

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI?
features.description: Unlock the power of transitions with our cutting-edge AI technology.

items.title: Instant Results
items.description: Experience quick and seamless transitions without the wait. Enhance your content immediately.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: No expertise needed. Just upload your image, choose the transition, and let our AI handle the rest.

items.title: Secure Processing
items.description: All processing happens on your device, ensuring your images remain private and secure.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to add stunning transitions

items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Drag and drop or browse to select your image. Supported formats include JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: Select Transition Effect
items.description: Choose from our range of smooth transitions that elevate your visuals while maintaining quality.

items.title: Download Enhanced Image
items.description: Preview your edited visual and download your image with the applied transition effect.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless satisfied users enhancing their visuals with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Emily Carter
items.comment: The slide transition made my presentation pop! I couldn't believe how easy it was.

items.name: Daniel Lee
items.comment: WaveSpeed transformed my travel photos. The fade-in effect added a professional touch.

items.name: Oliver Thompson
items.comment: The privacy during processing gave me confidence. My images were safe, and the results were stunning!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about transition effects

items.title: What transition effects does WaveSpeed offer?
items.description: We offer a variety of effects, including fade-ins, slide transitions, and more that can easily be applied to your images.

items.title: Is WaveSpeed free to use?
items.description: Yes! You receive 30 free credits daily for adding transitions. Additional credits can be earned through activities on our community platform.

items.title: Can I use enhanced content for commercial purposes?
items.description: Subscribers have the rights to use enhanced visuals commercially. Free-tier users can use them for personal projects only.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: Processing occurs directly in your browser, ensuring your images never leave your device. Once the tab is closed, all data is cleared.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Visuals?
footer.description: Transform your images with stunning transition effects now. No sign-up required.
